```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(hexbin)
```

```{r}
ces <-read_csv(here("data","ces3demographics.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```


```{r }

ggplot(data = ces, aes(x = white_percent, y = ces_3_0_score)) + 
  geom_hex() +
  labs(x = "Percent of White Population", y = "CalEnviroScreen 3.0 Score", title = "Relationship between white population and CalEnviroScreen 3.0 score in CA" )

```
